ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:0.5_0: The training rule on going wandering
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.2_0: At that time the nuns were staying right there at Rājagaha for the rainy season, the cold season, and the hot season.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.3_0: People complained and criticized the monks,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.4_0: “The nuns are leaving the districts in darkness and obscurity. They don’t brighten them up.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.7_0: They in turn told the Buddha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.8_0: After giving a teaching, the Buddha addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.9_0: “Well then, monks, I will lay down a training rule for the nuns for the following ten reasons:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.10_0: for the well-being of the Sangha ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.11_0: for the longevity of the true Teaching, and for supporting the training.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.12_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:1.13.1_0: ‘If a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not go wandering, even if only 65 to 80 kilometers, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.5_0: Who has completed the rainy-season residence:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.6_0: who has completed the first three or the last three months of the rainy-season residence.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.1.7_0: If she thinks, “I won’t go wandering, not even 65 to 80 kilometers,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.3_0: if she searches for a companion nun, but does not find one;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.8_0: The tenth training rule is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc40:2.2.9_0: The fourth sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
